Actions State: %s Stop Reason: %s Any SIM Card SIM %s Apply this rule to all SIMs or only to the selected SIM.

No need to change this if you only use one SIM card or don\'t need to distinguish between multiple SIMs.

Requires Android 12+. No need to change this if you only use one SIM card or don\'t need to distinguish between multiple SIMs.

When set as \"Any\", all rules will be checked, all per-rule SIM settings will be ignored.
When a SIM is selected, the call/SMS will be simulated on the selected SIM.

Requires Android 12+. The %s permission is required but not granted. Private Number Also known as Unknown Number or Empty Number, they are empty strings that can be matched by either of:
  .{0}
  ^$
  a blank regex field.

The priority is set to 20 to override other features like Repeated Call, so they are always blocked even if they repeat. Foreign Number Block all international calls except those from your own country with regex \\+(?!39).*, calls pass this rule will not be immediately allowed, they will be checked by other rules.

Change 39 to your country code.

Regex breakdown:
  - The Raw Number regex flag preserves the leading +, otherwise, it will be removed before checking.
  - \\+(?!39) matches any number starting with + that is not followed by 39 (foreign numbers). Verification Code .*(verification|validation).*code.* Allow SMS containing \"verification code\" or \"validation code\". code.*?(\\d+) Extract the digits after the word \"code\".

This regex doesn\'t need to be very strict since the message has already been filtered by the SMS rules. Always SIM Icon Requires the \"Phone State\" permission.

Auto
  Only show SIM icons when multiple SIM cards are in use.

Always
  Always show SIM icons. Screening This switch is for quickly disabling the app, useful when you\'re awaiting a particular call or message.

You can also toggle it from the Dropdown Quick Settings.

Call and SMS screening also need to be enabled separately below, they only work when this is enabled. For SMS, this app takes over the SMS notifications, it only filters SMS notifications, spam SMS messages will still be present in the SMS app.

Please turn off the notification permission of the default SMS app in system settings, otherwise there will be double notifications. MMS RCS SIM 2 Contacts SIM 2 Non-Contacts Allow contacts on SIM 2 and block everything else.

Requires Android 12+.

This will add two rules for SIM 2:
  - Allow contacts, priority 12.
  - Block everything else, priority 11. This overrides settings like RepeatedCall, so they\'ll always be blocked even if they repeat. Requires Android %s or higher. Only %s SIM card is detected. Toggled by Tile Custom Tile> Quickly toggle rules using the Quick Settings Tile. While the global tile toggles the entire app, this custom tile affects only specific rules.

This setup involves both a regex rule and a workflow. When the tile is:
  - On
  This workflow will be executed before calls are screened, it will enable the regex rule.

  - Off
  This workflow will never run, the rule will never work.

In short, when the tile is on, the rule is on, and vice versa.
